timeline.bodyText: Since both at line 120 and here toHydratedConcept is being called after updateConeptSet, how about calling   toHydratedConcept inside an conceptSetService.updateConceptSet? Or should we make the service return  Hydrated ConceptSet where ever possible like update/create?
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Good idea. Making toHydratedConcept a private method in ConceptSetService.
replies.author: freemabd

timeline.message: RW-5324 making toHydrate internal service method
